metadata.synopsis: One of the escaping hostages has made it to the lobby and tries to get the player's attention.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically when players arrive in the Iron Throne

0.speaker: Obelia Toobin
0.text: Help the others if you can - they're further in!

1.speaker: Obelia Toobin
1.text: I knew it, I knew someone would come save us!

2.speaker: Obelia Toobin
2.text: Thank Gond, finally - a way out of here!
